wikipedia_page.main: Christine Jackson (1942 – 11 October 2013), was the Chairperson of the Civil Liberties Trust and a lifetime campaigner for human rights. She chaired an NHS Health Trust, was on the Board of Sheffield Theatres and was a member of the Bar Council's Disciplinary Committee. In later life she conducted humanist funerals. She died of cancer.

response: * Christine Jackson – Girl Guide Leader, Crook, County Durham. For services to Children and Young People.
*Christine Jackson, 71, British human rights campaigner, cancer.Christine Jackson obituary
